Features

AutoTrader is jam-packed with useful features to help you create the best trading system - at all steps along the way.

Backtesting

Event-driven backtesting with data pre-loading and detailed statistics

  • Learn More

Strategy Optimisation

Parameter optimisation with SciPy

  • Learn More

Market Scanning

Easily turn your strategy into a market scanner with email notifications

  • Learn More

Live-trading

Effortlessly take your backtested, optimised strategy live

  • Learn More

Data Feeds

AutoTrader is integrated with major financial API's, making getting (and streaming) data easier than ever

  • Learn More

Interactive Visualisation

Analyse backtest and live-trade performance with interactive charting tools

  • Learn More
